Title: Uniting Severed Threads
Description:
You have done well to ally Anub'azal and Nizrek to our cause.

It is time that we solidify this triumverate relationship between us all. We will conference via shadecasters. Activate them when you're ready to begin.
ObjectivesText: Initiate the shadecaster conference between the Weaver, the General, and the Vizier.
